name: Emoticon to Emoji
description: Add Slack emoticon to emoji conversion and some others (like XD to :laughing:) and allow customized mappings

settings_schema.header: The plugin applies both the [Slack emoticon->emoji mappings](https://get.slack.help/hc/en-us/articles/202931348-Use-emoji-and-emoticons#use-emoticons) and a customizable mappings list which can be edited below.
settings_schema.footer: To report an issue, make a suggestion or a contribution, or fork your own version of the plugin, [check the repository](https://github.com/moussetc/mattermost-plugin-emoticon2emoji).

settings.help_text: Define your own emoticon to emoji mappings to replace the default mappings. The expected format is a JSON map. Don't put the colons for the emoji code and don't forget to escape any special characters ! To remove all custom mappings, set it to {}
